channel.title: Somebody with avg and their own running server help?
channel.description: ok so i was just wondering if avg blocks incoming players for servers ... the reasoin why is iu have read over every guide on making a server online but it still wont let people come... so if avg blocks that please tell me how to unblock (i hate it but my arents insist that it keeps on)

item.title: Somebody with avg and their own running server help?
item.dc:creator: @bludwow0 bludwow0
item.description:
@bludwow0 wrote:

u go to your router site… unblock it… and port forward… happened to me… luckily i read TUT’s

Read full topic
